title: 820-01041 ssd fail
message:

this ssd module it’s 1TB configuration (6 modules total) can be replace with minus one capacity?

title: 820-01041 ssd fail
message:
Pretty hopeless.
You should solder exact same chip model.
And even then, may not work.
